metadata.title: CVE-2024-5700 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 126, Firefox ESR 115.11, andThunderbird 115.11. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruptionand we presume that with enough effort some of these could have beenexploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127,Firefox ESR < 115.12, and Thunderbird < 115.12.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
